name: UIComponent
description: Configuration and content for UI components

name.description: name of UI component, matches Polymer proptotype.is property

templateName.description: Based on templateName component is generatred

filePath.description: If component is file based, file location

content.description: html content of the component, if not stored it is generated from model metadata

routePath.description: If this UI component handles a route then route path

modelName.description: If this component renders default UI for a model then model name

modelAlias.description: If model Alias is given it is used as primary model for binding, else lower case of modelName is used, for old UI Metadata migration this can be vm

fields.description: fields of default model to be rendered

options.description: Any data which can be used by UI for this component

polymerConfig.description: Polymer Configuration, used for polymer registration

autoInjectFields.description: Whether remaining model fields should be auto injected or not

excludeFields.description: Fields which are to be excluded from injection

importUrls.description: Additionals Import links for the component
